# Christian Prayer Reminder

A Chrome extension that provides gentle reminders for daily prayers, designed for Christians and all those who pray.

## Features

- Set custom times for morning, noon, and evening prayers
- Receive gentle notifications at your chosen prayer times
- Daily verse of inspiration
- Enable/disable individual prayer reminders
- Clean, intuitive interface
- Works for all prayer practitioners while maintaining Christian foundations

## Installation

1. Install from the [Chrome Web Store](https://chrome.google.com/webstore) (link to be added after publication)
2. Click the extension icon to open the prayer timer settings
3. Set your preferred prayer times
4. Click "Save Settings" to activate the reminders

## Usage

- Click the extension icon in your Chrome toolbar to open the settings
- Set your preferred times for morning, noon, and evening prayers
- Toggle the switches next to each time to enable/disable specific reminders
- Your settings are automatically saved and will persist between browser sessions
- Receive gentle notifications at your chosen prayer times
